name: Genitite: A Fight For Earth
description:
#rpg #adventure This is a game on where the Hero embarks on a glorious quest to stop the Goblins and all of the other Warlords that stands in your path. In the process you will encounter friendships falling apart, friends perishing and all together, you'll need the true ending...

WARNING: This game is quite short as it's currently in a demo state of development but the game will be finished and might just be the first in a series of games.
